name: Apparatchik
description:
This game features auto saving and multiple endings.

Best played in fullscreen mode.

Debug was intentionally left in for you to see some of the mechanics of the game.

You are one of the CIA 's/ KGB's top agents.  You have been hand selected by your nation's leader to win the Cold War, and prove your nation's superiority.

Recruit a top-notch team to agents to retrieve spy technology from around the world.  Send them on missions to gather intelligence on the whereabouts of different assets, and then to retrieve them for your homeland.

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/nRv86ntUSd
